price: If He were to ask you for it[22] and insist that you give it, you would greedily withhold, and He would expose your resentment [for spending].
arabic: إِن يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمُوهَا فَيُحۡفِكُمۡ تَبۡخَلُواْ وَيُخۡرِجۡ أَضۡغَٰنَكُمۡ
